column1: Kata Robata////The duck cold soba.... is the best cold soba I ever had. Cold soba is usually very plain and bland. Not this one. The duck was cooked perfectly and the foi gras went so well with the noodles. Also
column2: the plating makes the amount of noodles look very little
column3: but the two of us were too full to even finish. This was my favorite dish
column4: I will come back solely for these noodles.
